name: Cerean
special: Cereans begin the game with one rank in Vigilance. They still may not train Vigilance above rank 2 during character creation.

talents.title: Binary Processing
talents.description: Cereans treat all Knowledge skills as career skills

name: Human
special: Humans start the game with one rank in two different non-career skills of their choice. They still may not train these skills above rank 2 at character creation.

name: Kel Dor
special: Kel Dors begin the game with one rank in Knowledge (Education). They may not train Knowledge (Education) above rank 2 during character creation.

talents.title: Dark Vision
talents.description: When making skill checks, Kel Dors remove up to <setback_die><setback_die> imposed due to darkness

talents.title: Atmospheric Requirement
talents.description: Kel Dors must wear a specialized mask to breathe and see outside of their native atmosphere. A Kel Dor character starts the game with an antitox breath mask and treats oxygen as a dangerous atmosphere with Rating 8 (see page 220}. However, Kel Dors may survive in vacuum for up to five minutes before suffering its effects

name: Mirialan
special: Mirialans begin the game with one rank in Discipline. They still may not train Discipline above rank 2 during character creation.

name: Nautolan
special: Nautolans begin the game with one rank in Athletics. They still may not train Athletics above rank 2 during character creation.

talents.title: Amphibious
talents.description: Nautolans may breath underwater without penalty and never suffer movement penalties for travelling through water

name: Togruta
special: Togruta begin the game with one rank in Perception. They still may not train Perception above rank 2 during character creation.

talents.title: Pack Instincts
talents.description: When performing the assist maneuver, Togrutas grant <boost_die><boost_die> instead of <boost_die>

name: Twi'lek
special: Twi'lek begin the game with one rank in Charm of Deception. They still may not train Charm or Deception above rank 2 during character creation.

talents.title: Desert Dwellers
talents.description: When making skill checks Twi'lek may remove <setback_die> imposed due to arid or hot environmetal conditions.

name: Zabrak
special: Zabrak begin the game with one rank in Survival. They still may not train Survival above rank 2 during character creation.

talents.title: Fearsome Countenance
talents.description: Zabrak add automatic <advantage> to all Coercion checks they make.
